title: Adtech W220-34ZIP30 Hot, 30-Pack of Non-Yellowing Glue Sticks, Clear, 30 Count
description: Hot melt glue sticks bond wood, metal, glass, floral, fabric, and foam in 20 seconds! multitemp sticks are designed to provide a variable flow from low to high, covering most materials from delicate to less porous. 30-Pack of non-yellowing glue sticks. 4Long x 28diameter.
